title: FBI Is Probing Diamond Deals Struck by Founder of Jeweler Lugano
description: Federal authorities are investigating off balance-sheet transactions involving Lugano Diamonds & Jewelry, a chain of high-end boutiques that’s accused its founder of misrepresenting diamond investments he brokered with wealthy clients.
content: Federal authorities are investigating off balance-sheet transactions involving Lugano Diamonds & Jewelry, a chain of high-end boutiques that’s accused its founder of misrepresenting diamond investments he brokered with wealthy clients.
